page.title: 03A GLOSSOP FAMILY DAY OUT
page.content: The {Doyle Family }: if we are going out for the day we rise at 8.30am. get dressed and have a good breakfast. On this Sunday morning we set off for church just before 11am. and after the service set out for our destination by car. On this particular occasion we had decided to go to {Holmefirth}, now famous for making the TV comedy series {Last of the Summer Wine.} We walked through the town and found some of the places used in filming, such as {Sid's {Cafe. }After a stroll we went to Sid's Cafe to sign the visitors' book which is left on the counter. We looked through the pages, finding that people from far away, like {America,}had come to see our {local }place of fame. After a satisfactory day out we headed for home to prepare for work or school the next day.
